intro: Psychotria esmeraldana, commonly known as Emeraldana or the Emerald Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Ecuador and Colombia. The plant is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in cloud forests. Psychotria esmeraldana is also noted for its ornamental value and is cultivated for its attractive foliage and unique floral display.
